This speed build was made possible with the help of the following tools:

BUY a Proxxon hotwire cutter:
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

USA - http://amzn.to/2lVNvEM 
Canada - http://amzn.to/2pWazXF

Guider Pro by Shifting Lands (www.shiftinglands.com)

"Brick" Textured rolling pin by Green Stuff World (www.greenstuffworld.com)

USE PROMO CODE FOR %5 DISCOUNT on your Green Stuff World order: “BMCWINTER2019” (expires 31/03/2019)



This episode I test myself by building an entire little cottage house out of xps foam in just 3 hours! Start to finish,  building, painting, and ready for the tabletop in just 3 hours thanks to the help of the Proxxon hotwire cutter, Shifting Lands Guider Pro, and Green Stuff World textured rolling pin.
















Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: Medieval Cottage For D&D Tutorial (Black Magic Craft Episode 058)
